title: Ep. 75 - Ocean Poop
description:
This episode features a very cool conversation with musician and friend of the show Clayton Anderson.  Clayton and the boys discuss the country music industry, his personal battles with chasing success and how he overcame thoughts of giving up and regained his passion (0:00-49:44). After the interview the crew has a hilarious conversation about some world events and everyone gets to know Digs a letter better than they did before and we're not sure that's a good thing, and as always the guys each pick a song for Friday Bangerz to help send you into your Memorial Day weekend. Come have a good time with us, and enjoy Memorial Day.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, and @evanfoxy


Here's a tip for for today's episode - DON"T SKIP THE AD READS!  Each one is a heater.

Episode sponsors and discounts:

Leesa Mattress - get 15% off any mattress and 2 free pillows if you use the URL leesa.com/heartland and then use the promo code HEARTLAND at checkout

PostMates - get $100 of free delivery for your first 7 days when you download the app and use the code HEARTLAND

PolicyGenius - there's no discount code but policygenius.com is the easiest way to find the right life insurance, home insurance, auto insurance or disability insurance policies for you and your family.

Rhone - go to rhone.com/heartland and use promo code heartland to get 20% off your first purchase.
